thread.title: Police: Tractor-trailer strikes SUV cruiser, injures trooper - News and reviews
thread.title_full: Police: Tractor-trailer strikes SUV cruiser, injures trooper - News and reviews

author: boston.com
title: Police: Tractor-trailer strikes SUV cruiser, injures trooper - News and reviews
text:
NEWTON, Mass. (AP) — State police say a trooper was injured when the SUV cruiser he was in was struck by a tractor-trailer on the Massachusetts Turnpike.
State police spokesman Dave Procopio says it happened around 10 p.m. Friday at a work detail on Route 90, just after the Interchange 17 off-ramp in Newton.
 The cruiser, a Ford Explorer, was severely damaged, its rear end crushed. The tractor-trailer also was damaged.
Procopio says the trooper was taken by ambulance to Massachusetts General Hospital, where he was still being evaluated. The extent of his injuries wasn’t immediately clear.
Information about the truck driver or the owner of the truck wasn’t immediately available.
The crash remains under investigation.
